bcomactivities.title: Food Fest
bcomactivities.description: The Food Fest organized by the Commerce Department is one of the most exciting and vibrant events in the college calendar. It provides students with an opportunity to showcase their entrepreneurial, marketing, and teamwork skills in a fun and practical way. During the event, students set up various food stalls offering a wide range of dishes, snacks, and beverages prepared and managed by themselves.

bcomactivities.title: International Commerece Day Quiz Competition
bcomactivities.description: The International Quiz Day Competition gives students an exciting opportunity to showcase their understanding of global issues, current affairs, and world cultures. It encourages curiosity, sharpens knowledge, and nurtures a healthy competitive spirit, helping participants learn while having fun.

bcomactivities.title: Industrial Visits
bcomactivities.description: Industrial Visits were organized to Milma Dairy, Ambalathara, Thiruvananthapuram, offering students hands-on exposure to real-world business operations. The visit provided insights into dairy production processes, quality control, and management practices, bridging the gap between classroom learning and practical industry experience.

bcomactivities.title: Exhibition Stall
bcomactivities.description: Coordinated a commerce â€“ themed exhibition stall at VGHSS Ambikodayam Higher Secondary School, Nediyavila, introducing Higher secondary students to commercial concepts and career opportunities.

psychologyactivities.title: NIBODHANA
psychologyactivities.description: Mental Health Awareness Week:A one-week programme organized in connection with World Mental Health Day. Featured mental health games, awareness sessions, debates, poster-making, happiness wall creation, and an orientation class by Dr. Sijin K. S., Assistant Professor, Fatima Mata National College, Kollam.

psychologyactivities.title: World Suicide Prevention Day
psychologyactivities.description: Conducted a questionnaire survey and awareness activities promoting suicide prevention and emotional resilience.

psychologyactivities.title: Online Poster Designing Contest
psychologyactivities.description: Organized to foster creativity and raise awareness about mental health.

psychologyactivities.title: Short Film Presentation
psychologyactivities.description: A short film created by students highlighting the importance of mental health and positive coping strategies.

psychologyactivities.title: Flash Mobs
psychologyactivities.description: Two flash mobs performed at Kottarakkara Bus Stand and on the College Campus to spread messages of mental health awareness.

psychologyactivities.title: Exhibition Stall
psychologyactivities.description: Coordinated a Psychology-themed exhibition stall at VGSS Ambikodayam Higher Secondary School, Nediyavila, introducing Higher Secondary students to psychological concepts and career opportunities.

psychologyactivities.title: Industrial Visit
psychologyactivities.description: An industrial visit to the Rehabilitation Centre for Addicts (RCA) in Thiruvananthapuram, providing students with practical insights into addiction treatment and rehabilitation processes.

psychologyactivities.title: Free Online Counselling Service
psychologyactivities.description: Provided exam fear management counselling sessions for higher secondary students through online mode.
